snippet: The Washington Wizards reached the playoffs for the first time since 2008, clinching an Eastern Conference berth Wednesday night with a 118-92 win over the visiting Boston Celtics.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Washington Wizards defeat Boston Celtics, 118-92, to clinch an Eastern Conference playoff berth for first time since 2008; other basketball results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Washington Wizards reached the playoffs for the first time since 2008, clinching an Eastern Conference berth Wednesday night with a 118-92 win over the visiting Boston Celtics.

headline.main: Wizards Clinch First Playoff Berth in Six Years
headline.print_headline: Wizards Win First Berth in Six Years
